title: Every time the client start I get bugsplatted
body:
So I was haven't used my pc in a long time (a week or so) its been unplugged and in a corner. I have just started it up and found that the league of legends client would bugspat instantly apon opening. I say instantly but so times I got a full 3 seconds into the stargaurdian theme before bugsplating. I have tried reinstalling twice... I have removed avg from my computer (unberdanger the content creator had a similar issue and had to do so. Please help me out.
Thank you for your time, 
A proud summoner.

replies.body: We believe the culprit here might be Discord Overlay.  Disabling that should help fix this up!
if your on pc try running as admin
